sourcesContent:
import { Grid, Typography } from '@mui/material'
import { Box, Container } from '@mui/system'
import React from 'react'
import HolderImage from '../../holder.jpg'
import { getOurStory } from '../../util/AdminUtil'
import OurStoryBig from './OurStoryBig'
import OurStorySmall from './OurStorySmall'

const OurStory = () => {

    // const images = getOurStory();
    // const imagePath = images[0].path;

    return (
        <Container>
            <Box mt={8} mb={10} align="center">
                <Typography variant='h4' p={2} sx={{textTransform: 'uppercase'}}>
                    the work of a lifetime
                </Typography>
                <Typography sx={{width: {xs: "90%", sm: "70%", md: "60%"}}} textAlign="justify">
                    As an 8 year old boy I would spend my afternoons exploring a small creek near our cabin in Northern Wisconsin.
                    I would walk under the canopy of oak trees exploring, seeking, learning and playing on the creek's banks.
                    When I founded Stone Creek Coffee as a 24 year old it was that ethos that I wanted to infuse into our new company.
                    We continue this work today and welcome you to our coffee family.   
                </Typography>
                <Typography variant='h5' textAlign="center" ml={18} mt={2}>
                    - Ted, Founder 
                </Typography>
            </Box>

            {/* Section for big screens */}

        </Container>
    )
}

export default OurStory
